Active Videos (1727)

BLM757 activists appeal year-long jail sentences for "traffic obstruction" - Interviews

Oct 4, 2021

Black Lives Matter 757 activist "Pops" Holmes speaks to News2Share amidst an appeal hearing for a one-year jail sentence imposed on him for a charge of "obstructing traffic.". . Holmes had reportedly been charged for walking in the trolley lane in Virginia Beach during a protest in fall 2020, when the trolley was not operating, and all but ten days of the jail sentence were suspended.. . JaPharii Jones, also sentenced to a year in jail (suspended) in Hampton, Virginia on similar charges, and supporters of both activists, spoke to News2Share contributor Sean CW Korsgaard.. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Antifascist Jason Charter - called Antifa "ringleader" by Trump - interview following plea deal

Sep 14, 2021

During the civil unrest of 2020, then-President Trump sought to aggressively prosecute protesters accused of damaging federal property with an executive order directing federal law enforcement to seek ten year prison penalties in such cases.. . While the presidency has changed hands, many activists' lives are still affected by last summer. One such activist is Jason Charter.. . Charter was arrested in July 2020, and accused of participating in the destruction of a statue of Confederate Statue of Albert Pike in Washington DC, and the attempted destruction of a statue of the statue of Andrew Jackson that sits outside the White House.. . He faced 20 years in prison, and the Trump administration flaunted the arrest. Then-President Trump even referenced Charter as the "ringleader" at his Mount Rushmore speech on July 4.. . While on pre-trial release, Charter was re-arrested and charged with misdemeanor assault over a confrontation with right-wing journalist Jack Posobiec at a community meeting over whether to remove a statue of Abraham Lincoln from a DC park.. . In October, he was also arrested on the National Mall while protesting a conservative rally advocating voters "Walk Away" from the Democratic Party.. . One year and a new administration later, Charter agreed to plead guilty to a single count of misdemeanor trespassing in order to resolve all of the charges from last year.. . News2Share sat down with Jason Charter to discuss the summer of 2020, the charges, and the future of the antifascist movement.. . Jason Charter is expected to be sentenced on the single misdemeanor count in December. He faces up to six months in jail.. . Interview Produced by Ford Fischer. Featuring Jason Charter. . Archival Footage by. Ford Fischer / Jon Farina / TJ Jones / News2Share. . Trump Speech Footage. Courtesy USA Today. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

BLM757's JaPharii Jones confronted at Robert E. Lee statue removal + interview

Sep 8, 2021

As the Robert E Lee statue was removed in Richmond, Virginia on Wednesday, Black Lives Matter 757 activist JaPharii Jones ran through a barricaded area with a flag and was promptly removed by police.. . While many in the crowd cheered, a handful of activists confronted Jones, who they accused of being "allies with white supremacists" for forming a coalition with the anti-government "boogaloo boys," and claimed he works with police.. . Robert E. Lee statue removed, cut in half in Richmond, VA - crowds celebrate

Sep 8, 2021

Activists cheered as the statue of Confederate General Robert E. Lee was removed from Richmond, Virginia's Monument Avenue and cut in half Wednesday afternoon.. . The statue was removed in accordance with an executive order signed by Governor Ralph Northam, and its pieces will be stored at the Virginia’s Goochland Women’s Correctional Center, a female-only state prison.. . Sep 8, 2021

LIVE: Richmond, Virginia cuts down its statue of Robert E Lee, which was erected in 1890. Filmed by Ford Fischer

Proud Boys fight antifa following "Straight Pride Parade" in Modesto, CA

Aug 29, 2021

Right-wing activists including Proud Boys brawled with black-bloc-clad antifascist counter-protesters Saturday afternoon outside a Planned Parenthood in Modesto, California following a sparsely attended "Straight Pride Parade" event.. . Police intervened in the fighting and cleared the area with a riot formation before arresting Proud Boy Jeffrey Perrine, who had been ousted from the Sacramento County Republican Party in February. . . Right Wing Coalition Holds “Summer Of Love” Rally In Portland, OR

Aug 22, 2021

EDITOR'S NOTE: "THIS IS DOCUMENTARY FOOTAGE MEANT FOR HISTORICAL PURPOSES ONLY. NEWS2SHARE DOES NOT ENDORSE THE WORDS OF ACTIVISTS WE COVER.". . Right wing groups hold “Summer of Love” rally in Portland, Oregon. Filmed by Ford Fischer

Proud Boys and their allies fight with antifa at "Summer of Love" rally in Portland, OR

Aug 22, 2021

Proud Boys and other right-wing groups fought black-bloc-clad counter-protesters Sunday afternoon outside their "Summer of Love" rally in Portland, Oregon.. . The "Summer of Love" rally had originally been planned for downtown Portland, but shifted locations to a deserted Kmart parking lot 15 minutes away after antifa announced a counter-rally.. . In spite of the move, counter-protesters arrived at the rally, and intense violence primarily including mace, fireworks, and paintballs occurred. Proud Boys and their allies flipped a van that had been carrying counter-protesters onto its side following the violence.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Owen Shroyer at "Stop the Steal" events leading to January 6 - Documentary footage

Aug 20, 2021

Editor's note: "YouTube has been censoring videos that document the Stop the Steal movement for their claims of election fraud, even when the news outlet doesn't take a position.. . For that reason, I will quote the following disclaimer that YouTube used to include on election-related videos: 'Joe Biden is the president of the United States. States certify results after ensuring ballots are properly counted and correcting irregularities and errors, and "Robust safeguards help ensure the integrity of election results.'". . On Friday August 20th, Infowars personality J Owen Shroyer was charged with two counts for his role on January 6: entering restricted grounds, and violent entry and disorderly conduct on Capitol grounds.. . For the months preceding the Capitol breach on January 6, Shroyer was a prominent figure in the "Stop the Steal" movement. The following is documentary footage of Shroyer's involvement, which mostly consisted of fiery speeches, from the first Million MAGA March in November to the breach on January 6.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. At least one stabbed as antifa brawl with "Choose Freedom" rally attendees in LA

Aug 15, 2021

Dozens brawled in Los Angeles Saturday afternoon on the outskirts of a "Choose Freedom" rally, leaving one person confirmed stabbed and none arrested.. . Video shot by Andrew Kimmel of the fight at another angle shows an apparent right-winger smash an apparent counter-protester in the back of the neck with a weapon. The victim has not come forward, and the type of weapon is currently unclear. Some are saying the incident is a second stabbing.. https://twitter.com/andrewkimmel/status/1427763249185886209. . The protesters said their event was to oppose what they call “medical tyranny, mandatory vaccinations and vaccine passports." Antifa counter-demonstrated, and one person in black-bloc stabbed an apparent rally participant with a knife during the ensuing fight.. . One right-wing activist attacked News2Share's own cameraman twice but was later forced out of the event by his own side for instigating violence.. . Filmed by N2S Contributor Jake Lee Green. . "Black Voters Matter" marches to demand Biden "pick a side" on voting rights, senate cancel recess

Aug 4, 2021

"President Biden, do your job!" Black Voters Matter activists along with Reverend Jesse Jackson Sr. marched to the White House Wednesday morning to demand Biden "pick a side" on voting rights by denouncing the senate filibuster and supporting the "For the People Act.". . The activists also called on Senator Schumer to cancel the upcoming congressional recess unless the bill is passed.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Aug 4, 2021

BLM activist speaks on stage at rally for January 6 defendants

Jul 29, 2021

In an unusual moment of unity this weekend, a Black Lives Matter activist spoke on stage at a NYC rally for January 6 defendants, where he was cheered on as he condemned Trump supporters' incarceration and solitary confinement.. . He described the struggle as shared with the BLM movement, which he says is also persecuted and over aggressively policed.. . Filmed by N2S Contributor Jon Farina. . Jul 19, 2021

Police used batons and "less-lethal" riot munitions against a crowd of antifa activists in Los Angeles Saturday afternoon as they counter-protested a demonstration against a local spa. Several were arrested after police formed a "kettle" formation around part of the crowd.. . Wi Spa has become the target of demonstration following a viral video from a customer saying she was upset over a transgender woman in women's facilities.. . Activists rally for release of January 6 defendants outside DC jail

Jul 17, 2021

EDITOR'S NOTE: "This documentary primary source footage does not contain any violations of community standards and is meant to record a historical / educational situation ONLY. News2Share does not endorse the views contained therein.. . In order to extra adequately comply with YouTube's community standards on countervailing views, we recommend CISA.gov/rumorcontrol". . Dozens of activists led by "Look Ahead America" leader Matt Braynard gathered Saturday afternoon outside the jail in Washington DC where many January 6 defendants are still being detained to demand their immediate release.. . The group sang songs like "God Bless America" as armed correctional officers stood watch. No violence or arrests occurred. . . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Armed "Boogaloos" and BLM757 confront Virginia Capitol Police over new gun law

Jul 4, 2021

Armed Second Amendment activists with the "Boogaloo" movement and Black Lives Matter 757 approached the Capitol building in Richmond, Virginia and were confronted by police over a new state gun law preventing firearms on the premises, effective July 1.. . The coalition decried gun laws as "racist" and "tyranny" while defying local ordinances banning firearms at demonstrations and magazines above 20 rounds. No violence or arrests occurred.. . BLM757 holds armed Independence Day march in Virginia Beach

Jul 4, 2021

Black Lives Matter 757 led an Independence Day march in Virginia Beach along with support from the local "Boogaloo boys.". . The groups aimed to attract attention to the mass shooting that claimed the lives of Deshayla Harris and Donovan Lynch over three months ago.. . Lynch was killed by a still unnamed police officer whose bodycamera was not on; Harris's killer has not been confirmed as civilian or law enforcement. It has not been confirmed whether Lynch - who was armed - was involved in the shooting itself. Three civilian shooters were arrested.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . On Sunday, a coalition of pro-Trump activists rallied in Foley Square in New York City in an event billed "Free Political Prisoners Now" for January 6 defendants.. . Jun 23, 2021

Hundreds of progressive activists marched and several were arrested Wednesday afternoon at the United States Capitol during a protest against Senator Mitch McConnell (R) and Joe Manchin (D) for the senate's failure to pass the "For the People Act.". . Among the arrested were civil rights activists Rev. Jesse L. Jackson, Sr. and Rev. Dr. William J. Barber II of the Poor People's Campaign.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Attorney for January 6 defendants John Pierce speaks out

Jun 22, 2021

"Editor's note: YouTube has previously removed several of my videos pertaining to January 6 on the grounds that the people in them - even if not the channel itself - make claims of election fraud.. . In this case, many of the activists present expressed similar beliefs, as did Attorney John Pierce, who represents many of the defendants. While some may find his viewpoint unacceptable, I believe it is strongly important to provide uncut footage of such newsworthy events. I should note that CNN and Fox also had cameras there, but likely wouldn't provide the same beginning-to-end raw video.. . While I prefer to present all of my work as raw footage that speaks for itself, I included a warning in the video itself to make sure the video stays online, and I cite CISA.gov/rumorcontrol as a countervailing view.". . Conservative group “Look Ahead America” held a “Rally Against Political Persecution” Saturday afternoon at the Department of Justice Headquarters in Washington DC to demand the release of Trump supporters charged in the January 6 incident at the United States Capitol. Speakers included former former Trump strategist Matt Braynard, Rep. Paul Gosar, attorney John Pierce, one defendant’s father, and media personality Cara Castronuova.. . Full rally: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yvaJ7n-XGFQ. . Pierce, who is representing several January 6 defendants, pledged to take cases to trial and get acquittals.. . “They know the election was stolen from them. They were cheated out of that election,” he said of January 6 overall. “They showed up to have their voices be heard.”. . Pierce said of Ashli Babbitt – who was shot once inside the Capitol and died – is being “cancelled post-mortem.”. . “She was unarmed. She was no immediate threat of serious bodily harm or death to anyone.” He added that Babbitt experienced “deprivation of life without due process” and wants the officer who shot her named.. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Father of January 6 defendant speaks out

Jun 22, 2021

"Editor's note: YouTube has previously removed several of my videos pertaining to January 6 on the grounds that the people in them - even if not the channel itself - make claims of election fraud.. . While I prefer to present all of my work as raw footage that speaks for itself, I included a warning in the video itself to make sure the video stays online, and I cite CISA.gov/rumorcontrol as a countervailing view.". . Ned Lang, the father of January 6 defendant Edward “Jake” Lang (who has been jailed since January) spoke out at a rally on Saturday in Washington DC in defense of his son.. . “The United States has no more moral ground calling out other countries for inhumane treatment of their prisoners,” he claimed.. . Full “Rally Against Political Persecution” for January 6 defendants at DOJ in DC

Jun 19, 2021

Conservative group "Look Ahead America" held a “Rally Against Political Persecution” Saturday afternoon at the Department of Justice Headquarters in Washington DC to demand the release of Trump supporters charged in the January 6 incident at the United States Capitol.. . Speakers included former former Trump strategist Matt Braynard, Rep. Paul Gosar, attorney John Pierce (who represents several of the defendants), one defendant's father, and media personality Cara Castronuova.. . "Editor's note: YouTube has previously removed several of my videos pertaining to January 6 on the grounds that the people in them - even if not the channel itself - make claims of election fraud.. . In this case, many of the activists present expressed similar beliefs, as did Attorney John Pierce, who represents many of the defendants. While some may find his viewpoint unacceptable, I believe it is strongly important to provide uncut footage of such newsworthy events. I should note that CNN and Fox also had cameras there, but likely wouldn't provide the same beginning-to-end raw video.. . While I prefer to present all of my work as raw footage that speaks for itself, I included a warning in the video itself to make sure the video stays online, and I cite CISA.gov/rumorcontrol as a countervailing view.". . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Low-flying helicopters as U.S. Capitol Police hold "routine training exercise"

Jun 8, 2021

Emergency vehicles including two low-flying helicopters maneuvered throughout the grounds of the United States Capitol Monday morning, in what U.S. Capitol Police said was a "routine training exercise.". . "Please do not be alarmed if you see emergency vehicles and low flying helicopters," the USCP wrote in a statement ahead of the event, the first of its kind in years.. . Thousands including Jane Fonda march in Minnesota against Line 3 Pipeline

Jun 8, 2021

Thousands of water and treaty rights activists including actress Jane Fonda marched Monday morning in Northern Minnesota to demand that President Biden cancel his approval of further construction on the Line 3 Pipeline.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Activists trek into Mississippi River Line 3 planned construction site

Jun 8, 2021

Following a water rights march, about fifty activists trekked across a marsh into the Mississippi River Monday afternoon to demand President Biden rescind his approval of the Line 3 Pipeline, which is expected to flow under the river.. . While the Canadian Enbridge Corporation marked the area with "no trespassing" signs, an Ingenious Sheriff's Deputy shook hands with the group and pledged not to interrupt as long as the action remained peaceful.. . No arrests or violence occurred as the activists held a prayer dance and asserted that Biden's approval violates treaty rights guaranteed under Article 6 of the United States Constitution.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Police Versus Protesters Occupying Line 3 Construction Site

Jun 7, 2021

Police confront protesters occupying Line 3 construction site in Minnesota. Filmed by Ford Fischer

Dozens arrested occupying Line 3 Pipeline Enbridge Construction site

Jun 7, 2021

At least 30 people were arrested Monday evening attempting to occupy a construction site that the Canadian Enbridge Corporation was using to build the Line 3 pipeline in Northern Minnesota.. . Activists say the pipeline jeopardizes local hunting, fishing, and fresh water. They believe President Biden's approval of the ongoing project violates treaty rights enumerated in Article 6 of the U.S. Constitution.. . Construction was halted for the day as several policing agencies sent officers in riot gear to clear the protesters from the site, some of whom chained themselves to the equipment.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Pro-gun activists hold open carry fishing trip in Florida

Jun 6, 2021

Pro-gun activists openly carried rifles and handguns to fish off a Surfside pier just north of Miami Sunday morning, where police watched while carrying rifles as well.. . Openly carrying a firearm is generally illegal in Florida, but an exemption exists for those traveling to or from a camping, hunting or fishing trip.. . Activist Michael Taylor, who goes by @SoloYaker and @The Armed Fisherman on YouTube, led the event after having been previously arrested for open carrying while holding a fishing pole police claimed was "inoperable.". . Filmed by Marcelo Sanchez for News2Share. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Interviews: Water rights activists and Interfaith leaders to protest Line 3 Pipeline in Minnesota

Jun 6, 2021

"I am here to protect our treaty rights of hunting, fishing, and gathering.". . On Monday, hundreds of activists are expected to gather for a direct action to interrupt construction of the Line 3 Pipeline and demand President Biden revoke his support for the project.. . News2Share spoke to four water rights and faith leaders planning to participate from the campgrounds activists are using as a base ahead of the action, which we plan to cover throughout the day.. . Interviews include:. -Rev. Dr. Ambrose Carroll, Sr., Senior Pastor at The Church by the Side of the Road in Berkeley, CA. . -Debra Topping, a Water Rights Activist from the Fond du Lac Reservation in Minnesota. . -Rev. Fletcher Harper, Executive Director of GreenFaith. . -Rev. Susan Hendershot, President of Interfaith Power & Light. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Battle over Northeast entrance to U.S. Capitol on January 6 - PREVIOUSLY UNRELEASED 4K FOOTAGE

Jun 4, 2021

Editor's note from Ford Fischer: "On January 6 at the Capitol, I had TJ Jones shooting a second angle for News2Share. He filmed the entire siege specifically from the Northeast Capitol entrance.. . While I've made this footage available to networks already, today I can release it publicly for the first time.". . Previously unreleased 4K footage: Police fought with Trump supporters attempting to enter the Capitol's Northeast entrance for over an hour on January 6.. . Officers attempted to use pepper spray, string balls, and fire extinguisher to deter the crowd, who responded using barricades as battering rams, threw rocks, and deployed mace back at officers.. . The entrance was ultimately cleared as officers with riot shields managed to push the crowd into the East Capitol lawn.. . Filmed by TJ Jones for News2Share. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Armed "Boogaloo" and BLM 757 activists hold "Get the Strap" rally in Virginia Beach

May 30, 2021

A coalition of activists including armed "boogaloo" and Black Lives Matter 757 members held an armed "Get the Strap" march to oppose police violence and gun control Saturday evening in Virginia Beach.. . Police largely surveilled the group from a distance without making contact as they marched for about two hours. One masked "Boogaloo" member had an earpiece allowing him to listen to the police radio.. . The group paused when officers apparently said someone called them to report the group had pointed a weapon at them. News2Share observed no such incident, and the police did not appear to respond to the report.. . While many individuals in the group have rallied at Richmond, Newport News, and Virginia Beach, the "boogaloo" activists used new branding, describing themselves as "Virginia Kekoas" and wearing matching patches.. . BLM757 leader JaPharii Jones led the group to the death site and makeshift memorials for Deshayla Harris and Donovon Lynch, the two fatalities amidst a shootout that begun among civilians, leaving six others injured.. . Lynch was shot dead by police. Harris's shooter is unclear.. . Police wore bodycams but didn't turn them on.. . Jones is not new to activism in Virginia Beach. Last week, Jones was sentenced to two years in jail for allegedly "blocking roadway" and "resisting arrest" during a previous march.. . He calls the sentence, which was suspended, a "slap in the face for democracy.". . No arrests occurred Sunday.. . "In our experience, armed protesters don't usually get... messed with," one masked "Boogaloo Boy" told News2Share. "I wanna make sure that doesn't happen to my buddy again.". . After additional BLM757 members joined in with the group, who then marched back along the Virginia Beach boardwalk.. . "Black Lives Matter!" they chanted. "Say her her name! Which one? Say his name! Which one?". . "No justice, no peace!". . In an interview following the rally, Jones contended that there are "no good cops in a racist system.". . "I can't speak for everyone in the group, but I would say so," one Boogaloo said when asked by News2Share if they agree on the sentiment.. . "All the rights for all the people," another added.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Antifa face off with Portland police on George Floyd death anniversary

May 27, 2021

Portland Police declared about 200 antifascist demonstrators to be engaged in a "riot" Tuesday night after the group set fire to a dumpster and shot fireworks at officers.. . Five were arrested as protesters marched throughout the city starting small fires and breaking windows to commemorate the one year anniversary of the death of George Floyd.. . Filmed by Maranie R. Staab. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Oath Keepers Enter Capitol East Side on January 6, 2021

May 21, 2021

NOTE TO YOUTUBE: THIS RECORDING SHOWS RAW FOOTAGE OF A SITUATION IMPORTANT TO NEWS AND DOCUMENTARY UNDERSTANDING AND CRITICISM ONLY. NEWS2SHARE DOES NOT ENDORSE ANY VIEWS CONTAINED HEREIN. THE VIDEO DOES NOT VIOLATE ANY COMMUNITY STANDARDS IN ANY WAY. NEWS2SHARE REMINDS VIEWERS TO SEE https://www.cisa.gov/rumorcontrol FOR ADDITIONAL COUNTERVAILING VIEWS.. . Editor's note from Ford Fischer: About a half year after the events of January 6, 2021, multiple feature documentaries have reached out for licensing, some asking for more detailed video than the main one published on the same day (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b76KfHB0QO8).. . Among the most frequently requested themes is the Oath Keepers, one of the most organized groups involved. Thousands Hold “Free Palestine” March In DC

May 15, 2021

Thousands hold #SaveSheikhJarrah “Free Palestine” protest in Washington DC. Filmed by Ford Fischer. Support News2Share: Patreon.com/fordfischer

Thousands march for Palestine in Washington DC - May 15, 2021 raw footage

May 15, 2021

"Biden Biden, you will see! Palestine will be free!". . A coalition of thousands of activists held a Free Palestine march in Washington D.C. Saturday afternoon.. . "Israel is a terror state!" chanted activists on the steps of the National Archives. "Israel is an apartheid State!". . "Hey hey, ho ho, the occupation has got to go!". . "Jerusalem is ours alone!" chanted the activists as they approached the U.S. Capitol. "Gaza is ours alone!". . "Settler settler go back home, Palestine is ours alone!". . "Free, free Palestine!". . "Palestine is no longer taboo! We are rising," said Jinan Shabt of The American-Arab Anti-Discrimination Committee when the group arrived and rallied on the west side of the U.S. Capitol. "We have members of congress who support us!". . She encouraged activists to reach out to congress.. . "We need to condition the aid to Israel," she added.. . Hannah Shraim from told attendees to demand congress divest from Israel and support for House Bill 2590, whose formal title is "To promote and protect the human rights of Palestinians living under Israeli military occupation and to ensure that United States taxpayer funds are not used by the Government of Israel to support the military detention of Palestinian children, the unlawful seizure, appropriation, and destruction of Palestinian property and forcible transfer of civilians in the West Bank, or further annexation of Palestinian land in violation of international law.". . "Invest it back into our Black and Brown communities who are policed by a terror force," Shraim said. "Not into the state of Israel.". . Director of Outreach & Grassroots Organizing for the American Muslims for Palestine (AMP) Taher Herzallah noted that Biden is holding a White House Eid celebration tomorrow, which received instant "boos" from the crowd.. . "You better believe we will not walk on the graves of our Palestinian children by celebrating with him," Herzallah said, encouraging a boycott.. . "We need sanctions! Demilitarize Israel!" said Professor Noura Erakat in the final official speech of the event. "Save all of Palestine from the river to the sea! We will all be free!". . She led the group in chants of "Free, free Palestine!" before complimenting the movement for not giving up over decades.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Political Fraudsters Jacob Wohl And Jack Burkman Hold A Press Conference On Matt Gaetz

May 13, 2021

Political fraudsters Jacob Wohl and Jack Burkman - currently facing felonies for voter suppression - hold a press conference about Matt Gaetz. Filmed by Ford Fischer

Fraudsters Jacob Wohl and Jack Burkman hold presser on Matt Gaetz and Rudy Giuliani

May 13, 2021

Political fraudsters Jacob Wohl and Jack Burkman, while out on $100,000 bond for an alleged voter suppression scheme, held a press conference Thursday afternoon accusing Congressman Matt Gaetz and Rudy Guliani of sexual misconduct with young women.. . As with all of the pair's previous events, News2Share believes it is important to document and challenge their generally false and generally disprovable claims.. . News2Share's Ford Fischer and Salon's Zachary Petrizzo were the only two reporters to attend and ask questions of the pair.. . While Congressman Gaetz does face serious allegations of sexual misconduct unrelated to the Burkman/Wohl scene, the claims made by Burkman, Wohl, and a woman they presented as "Gabrielle Lucille Faulkner" (the pair has fabricated the identities of past supposed witnesses in other press conferences) do not appear legitimate.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Reps Rashida Tlaib and André Carson speak at Free Palestine rally

May 11, 2021

Congresswoman Rashida Tlaib and Congressman André Carson both spoke out to the crowd ahead of the May 14 Free Palestine march in Washington DC.. . "The ethnic cleansing continues now," Congresswoman Tlaib said of Israel's actions. "We all deserve to live freely and with human dignity.". . "What they are doing to the Palestinians is what they are doing to our Black brothers and sisters here," she told the crowd. "As you all are marching for freedom of Palestine, please know that you must be marching for everybody's freedom.". . "It's all interconnected.". . "If you are Black, this is your fight. If you are Latino, this is your fight. If you are South Asian, this is your fight. If you're white, this is your fight. If you're Jewish, this is sure enough your fight," said Congressman Carson.. . "If you're an American, this is your fight.". . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Enviro Protesters Target DC Wells Fargo Branches Over Pipeline Funding

May 7, 2021

Environmental protesters in Washington DC target Wells Fargo over funding of Line 3 Pipeline. Filmed by Ford Fischer

Protesters "spill oil" to oppose Wells Fargo funding of Line 3 throughout DC.

May 7, 2021

Activists with Shut Down DC and Extinction Rebellion Washington DC protested outside several branches of Wells Fargo to oppose their corporate funding of the Line 3 Pipeline Friday morning with mixed results. . . The group encountered some forceful pushback from police and a civilian at their first action, where they painted the words "Stop Line 3" in fake oil on the window of a downtown branch.. . The group managed to get a short, makeshift meeting with a Dupont Circle Wells Fargo branch manager before heading to the company's DC headquarters, where they spilled the fake oil onto the sidewalk and left behind police-style tape reading "Climate Emergency.". . Activists in Elizabeth City debate over communicating with police

May 6, 2021

Note from Editor-in-Chief Ford Fischer: "Like all News2Share content, this is a video I'm delivering in a raw, uncut format. I wrestled with whether or not to post this video at all, but I've decided it's relevant largely based on the community it impacts posting about it online. While activists tend to strive for a unified front, moments like this exemplify the challenges faced in the course of that task.". . Activists in the same coalition calling for justice in the shooting of Andrew Brown debated with one another on the evening of May 1st in Elizabeth City, North Carolina.. . As a march for Brown approached its conclusion ahead of a midnight curfew, Lydia McCaskill, General of the Original Black Panthers of Gastonia, North Carolina, spotted Rev. Gregory Drumwright, a prominent NC-based civil rights leader, speaking with police at the site of a major rally taking place the next day.. . While Rev. Drumwright, said that he had been at the location for nearly an hour and had only been approached by officers in the five minutes ahead of the confrontation, McCaskill's side accused him of being a "lapdog" for the police because of a willingness to communicate with law enforcement.. . "I just don't understand why we're turning on eachother," said Rev. Drumwright.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . May 2, 2021

Rev. Greg Drumwright and Former North Carolina State Senator Erica Smith spoke at a rally for Criminal Justice Reform memorializing Andrew Brown in Elizabeth City Sunday afternoon. . . "You need to declare a state of emergency for the system of white supremacy that has kept its knees on our necks for far too long," said Rev. Drumwright, referring to North Carolina's "State of Emergency" declaration following the police killing of Andrew Brown.. . "We have to present a unified front," he said. Rev. Greg Drumwright leads family, community in march for Andrew Brown in Elizabeth City, NC

May 2, 2021

Prominent civil rights activist Rev. Greg Drumwright led Elizabeth city activists and the family of Andrew Brown in a march for criminal justice and policing reform Sunday afternoon.. . The group continues to demand that bodycam footage be released in the shooting of Brown, which occurred nearly two weeks ago.. . Brown's young daughter attended the march wearing a shirt portraying her father with a print that read "In memory of my daddy Andrew Brown.". . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Activists for Andrew Brown visit family and shooting site

May 2, 2021

Protesters marching for the twelfth straight night demanding the release of bodycamera footage in the the police shooting death of Andrew Brown embraced his surviving family Saturday evening.. . As the march continued, activists were led to the site where Brown was shot. In a somber reflection, the group saw how mud kicked up by Brown's car as he was shot remained on the side of the house he died next to, where a mural has now been painted in his likeness.. . "Original Black Panthers of Gastonia" NC General Lydia McCaskill speaks in Elizabeth City

Apr 30, 2021

Lydia McCaskill, General of the Original Black Panthers of Gastonia, North Carolina, spoke out Friday evening following a community barbecue in Elizabeth City amidst protests over the police killing of Andrew Brown.. . McCaskill - who was arrested Tuesday night for violating curfew during a peaceful protest - told the crowd that "we stand in solidarity" with the community.. . "We're not out here to start anything. We want to finish a horrible thing that happened to Andrew Brown. That's it. We want answers.". . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Night 3: Riot police arrest Andrew Brown protesters amidst curfew in Elizabeth City, NC

Apr 30, 2021

Riot police arrested at least four protesters Thursday night in Elizabeth City, North Carolina as the area entered its third night of curfew. Protests have not turn violent, but activists have refused to leave the street.. . Police formed a line and pushed back on protesters who remained past the beginning of the 8 pm curfew around 9:20 pm.. . As officers pushed past alleys and backyards, they checked to make sure nobody escaped those directions. In one instance caught on camera, an officer pointed a weapon around a corner, while another unholstered his handgun as he searched the area.. . They found a bag, but not a person.. . "We just want justice, that's all!" yelled an activist at the police line.. . "Leave now, or you will be arrested!" Officers pushed forward, grabbed a man, and pulled him away from sight behind the shield line.. . A second man walked into the intersection and held his fist in the air, knowing he'd be arrested.. . "Do not resist Darius, give them your hands!" a concerned woman begged from behind him. Police pulled him away and continued their push.. . "Leave now or you will be arrested!" they repeated.. . Some mocked the police by doing wheelies and stunts on four-wheelers and dirt bikes on the street, within view of the police but absolutely out of range of arrest.. . As some of the four-wheel riders sped away past the police, an officer pulled their car out into the intersection in an apparent attempt to block them.. . An occupied vehicle (at least a driver and passenger - maybe more) had been on the block the police had lined up at.. . Officers surrounded the car and arrested the occupants.. . "We are now gonna start arresting press, y'all need to leave," police told journalists toward the end of the night, despite the mayor and governor exempting media from curfew enforcement.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Protesters March For Andrew Brown In Elizabeth City, NC

Apr 29, 2021

Protesters In Elizabeth City, NC Oppose 8pm Curfew

Apr 29, 2021

Protesters for Andrew Brown face off with police in Elizabeth City during curfew. Filmed by Ford Fischer

Riot police arrest Andrew Brown protesters for curfew in Elizabeth City, North Carolina

Apr 29, 2021

Riot police forcefully arrested several protesters in Elizabeth City, North Carolina Wednesday night for defying an 8 pm curfew.. . The protesters had been demanding the release of complete bodycamera footage in the police shooting death of Andrew Brown, which had been denied earlier in the day by a local judge.. . "You guys are out here in riot gear when there's been nothing but peace in Elizabeth City," said an activist into a megaphone a block from the police line. "It makes no sense at all! They have been peaceful! What is the point of this?". . Police approached and arrested her. While handcuffed, she yelled out that officers were charging her with "inciting a riot.". . The protest had not involved violence or vandalism ahead of policing intervening.. . "Andrew Brown! Andrew Brown!". . Protesters loaded into a police bus continued to speak to the press from behind the barred window.. "They're violating our human rights," one said. "They're barbaric." "We just want them to be transparent about this bodycam footage.". . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Protests Continue Into Curfew In Elizabeth City, NC

Apr 28, 2021

Protests continue during curfew in Elizabeth City, North Carolina. Filmed by Ford Fischer

Corrections officer and wife confront activists protesting neighbor Prosecutor Pete Orput

Apr 26, 2021

A Minnesota correctional officer is on "investigatory leave" following an incident Sunday afternoon in Stillwater, Minnesota in which he confronted activists protesting his neighbor.. . On Sunday, activists gathered outside the house of prosecutor Pete Orput. This was their third demonstration outside his home, where they demanded he upgrade charges for Officer Kim Potter - charged in the shooting of Daunte Wright - from manslaughter to murder.. . They did this in the form of a Sunday prayer service on the street.. . A few houses away and across the street, a couple confronted the crowd.. . Sgt. Paul Gorder a, a 30-year veteran of Minnesota Correctional Facility – Stillwater, confronted the crowd along with his wife.. . "F*** off, c*** f***er!" he said. ""You touch my wife, I'll kick your ass.". . No violence occurred.. . "All you f***ing n***ers, get out of here," his wife said.. . Told to return to his home by Stillwater Police, Sgt. Gorder repeatedly told officers to "shut up!". . After a separate angle of the event was posted by an activist, Sgt Gorder was placed on "investigatory leave.". . An activist tells News2Share Sgt. Gorder's wife confronted activists over the event a neighbor's driveway. The activists had apparently offered to move if the neighbor needed to leave.. . "The actions in this video in no way reflect the values of the MN DOC. Commissioner Schnell has ordered the incident be investigated by our Office of Professional Accountability, and the employee is on investigative leave," said Minnesota Department of Corrections after an activist released another video angle of the situation.. . News2Share will not be identifying the wife.. . News2Share does not endorse the words or actions of the people we document. . . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Families of victims of state violence speak out, grieve at Minnesota governor's mansion

Apr 25, 2021

Activists gathered alongside the families of victims of state violence (including but not exclusively by police) Saturday afternoon to speak and grieve outside the Minnesota Governor's Mansion.. . The families emphasized that while they celebrate the conviction of Derek Chauvin and attention to cases like George Floyd's, their stories also matter, and they condemned politicians like Governor Tim Walz (D) and Senator Amy Klobuchar (D) for speaking at the funeral of Daunte Wright while generally opposing their pleas.. . The speakers included:. . 03:15: Amity Dimock, Mother of Kobe Heisler, autistic man shot dead by Brooklyn Center Police in 2019. . 08:50: Del Shea Perry, Mother of Hardel Sherrell, man who died in 2018 in Beltrami County Jail after officers accused him of "faking" medical condition. . 14:58: Kimberly Handy-Jones, Mother of Cordale Handy, shot dead by police in St. Paul in 2017. . 41:52: Gabriel Black Elk, Brother of Paul Castaway, suicidal man shot dead by Denver police in 2015 while holding knife to his own throat. . 51:36: Cephus “Uncle Bobby” Johnson, Uncle of Oscar Grant, shot in the back by BART Police Officer at Fruitville Station in Oakland, CA. . 59:02: Marilyn Hill, Mother of Demetrius Hill, shot by Saint Paul police during a raid on the wrong address in 1997. . 01:02:54: Tybetha Prosper, Mother of Naajikhan Powell, man who died by suicide in Hennepin County Jail after being transfered from psych unit at hospital and placed alone in a cell without suicide safeguards. . 01:11:56: Taren Vang, Girlfriend of Travis Jordan, shot dead by Minneapolis Police while suicidal. . 01:15:58: Bayle Gelle, Father of Dolal Idd, shot by Minneapolis Police in 2020.. . 01:26:17: Deborah Watts, Cousin of Emmett Till, boy lynched in Mississippi in 1955. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Protesters march for Ma'Khia Bryant at Minnesota Governor's Mansion

Apr 23, 2021

Black Lives Matter activists protested for Ma'Khia Bryant Friday afternoon outside the mansion of Minnesota Governor Walz in St. Paul. Bryant was shot dead by Columbus Police earlier this week, who called the death a "tragedy" but say they were protecting another teenage girl who she had confronted with a knife.. . Multiple activists compared officers' approach to Bryant to that of Kyle Rittenhouse, who left Kenosha after killing two and injuring a third without being immediately arrested. Rittenhouse has claimed self-defense and turned himself in the following morning.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Family releases balloons and doves for Donovan Lynch, who was shot by Virginia Beach police in March

Apr 18, 2021

The family of Donovan Lynch released balloons and doves in his honor Saturday, which would have been be his 26th birthday.. . “He’s here in spirit. He’s here in our hearts,” said Wayne Lynch, Donovan's father. “We’re gonna keep his name alive.”. . He says he’s made a career of protecting the lives of young Black men and will continue to expand on that effort.. . The family released four doves. One symbolized Donovan, and three symbolized the Christian Holy Trinity.. . “We love you Donovan,” his father waved as the doves flew into the distance.. . Lynch was shot by police amidst a firefight between civilians on March 26, 2021.. . Police initially claimed Lynch was armed but later retracted their claim, saying that a firearm was "in the vicinity" of his body and that there was "no immediate evidence" it belonged to him.. . At least one additional injured person was hit by police, and three were arrested.. . Deshayla E. Harris, 28, who police admit was a bystander, was also killed by a stray bullet, but police have not charged anyone in her shooting.. . The officers involved wore bodycameras, but did not activate them during the incident.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Black Lives Matter 757 marches in Virginia Beach for Donovan Lynch and Deshayla E. Harris

Apr 18, 2021

Black Lives Matter 757 marched Saturday night throughout Virginia Beach, drawing attention to the site of a mass shooting that left nine injured and two dead last month.. . Donovan Lynch, who would have turned 26 Saturday, was shot by police amidst a firefight between civilians. Police initially claimed Lynch was armed but later retracted their claim, saying that a firearm was "in the vicinity" of his body and that there was "no immediate evidence" it belonged to him.. . At least one additional injured person was hit by police, and three were arrested. Deshayla E. Harris, 28, who police admit was a bystander, was also killed by a stray bullet, but police have not charged anyone in her shooting.. . An organizer with BLM757 contended that police likely killed her in the crossfire. The officers involved wore bodycameras, but did not activate them during the incident.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Apr 13, 2021

As protesters faced off Monday night in Brooklyn Center, Minnesota over the death of Daunte Wright, Attorney General Keith Ellison and Mayor Mike Elliott spoke to the activists on the frontlines.. . "I know y'all are angry, I'm angry too,"Mayor Elliott told the crowd. He promised to "get to the bottom of this" and make sure the officer is "held accountable.". . He also told protesters to keep "distance" from the officers.. . "We don't need need no more new cases, and certainly you all are bravely raising your voices, standing for justice," added AG Ellison, who insisted he intends to get justice in the death of #DaunteWright and doesn't want to see protesters hurt.. . Protesters take DC Metro train, march for Daunte Wright

Apr 12, 2021

"Every city, every town, burn the precinct to the ground!" Hundreds of activists in black bloc marched through Washington DC Monday night for Daunte Wright, who was killed by police Sunday in a Minneapolis suburb. . . In an unusual move for DC protesters, the group stormed into the Dupont Circle Metro Station, hopped turnstiles, and took a train three stops to Chinatown where they continued marching. Protesters shot fireworks and sprayed graffiti on businesses, and no arrests occurred.. . The officer claims she had a negligent discharge after mistaking her firearm for a taser.. . President Biden announced a series of gun control executive orders Thursday, one of which attempts to target unregistered "ghost guns." News2Share interviewed a Second Amendment activist at a rally in January about his 3D-printed "ghost gun.". . Biden's new proposal would classify partial kits as firearms but would not be able to prevent the private printing of 3D printed firearms.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . "Boogaloos" rally against police militarization following arrest of Michigan man Omar Shafie

Apr 4, 2021

Armed "Boogaloo boys" rallied Easter Sunday afternoon outside the Ann Arbor Justice Center in Ann Arbor, Michigan to condemn police militarization and protest the detainment of Michigan man Omar Shafie.. . Shafie was arrested on March 25 at the conclusion of a 36-hour armed standoff with the Washtenaw County Sheriff’s Office in his parents' home in the Superior Charter Township.. . Full article, including details of the Shafie arrest: https://news2share.com/start/2021/04/04/boogaloos-hold-armed-rally-against-police-militarization-following-arrest-of-michigan-man-omar-shafie/. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Part 2: Coalition Led By BLM Protests For Anthony Hulon

Apr 3, 2021

Part 2: A coalition led by Black Lives Matter activists rallies for Anthony Hulon, a white man killed by police in Lansing Jail. Filmed by Ford Fischer

BLM activists lead protest for Anthony Hulon, white man killed in Lansing Police custody

Apr 3, 2021

A coalition of activists led by Black Lives Matter organizers protested Saturday afternoon in Lansing, Michigan for Anthony Hulon, a white man who died nearly a year ago in Lansing Jail.. . "What's his name? Anthony Hulon!" activists chanted. "No justice, no peace! F*** 12! Murdering a** b****es!". . The march began at Lansing's Ferris park where about 60 community activists gathered. The group marched past the Michigan State Capitol to the Lansing Police Department (LPD) Headquarters, where they held a rally. The same building also contains the Lansing jail.. . Hulon, 54, died on April 11, 2020 in the Lansing jail after four Lansing Police Department officers pinned him on his stomach for several minutes while he was handcuffed.. . The situation was recorded by a security camera inside the jail cell.. . Footage shows officers, Edgar Guerra, Gary Worden, Charles Wright and Trevor Allman holding down Hulon even after he said "I can't breathe.". . "Positional asphyxia" was the formal cause of death according to the Ingham County Medical Examiner's Office. The office labeled the death as a homicide.. . Hulon had been arrested twelve hours earlier on a misdemeanor domestic violence charge.. . The Buckfire Law firm has filed a lawsuit against the city, the Lansing Police Department, and six individual LPD members for wrongful death, including all four who physically held him down. No criminal charges have been filed against any of the officers involved.. . Lansing resident James Henson - who is forming a Black Panther Party chapter - spoke in front of the LPD HQ.. . "This has been going on for so long, but not only for so long, it's been going on nonstop," said Henson, who carried a handgun on his right leg. "We want change. In order to make that change, we gotta force that change.". . "We need to do things that other people are afraid to do if we want to actually be free," he added.. . Democratic Lansing mayoral candidate Farhan Sheikh-Omar pointed out that "Anthony Hulon died a month before George Floyd.". . Sheikh-Omar criticized Democratic Lansing Mayor Andy Schor for having marched with Black Lives Matter over the summer, after Hulon's death but before the public was aware of the details.. . "Andy Schor marched with this community. He took a knee with this community, knowing that a man had died inside that city jail," he said. "He did not tell us. He did not tell the city council.". . "He did not even give any answers to Anthony Hulon's family," he added. "They had to get a lawyer in order to get answers.". . Sheikh-Omar added that he would fire the officers involved if elected.. . It was originally expected that members of the anti-government "Boogaloo" movement would participate, but apparent political disagreements ahead of the event caused a split. About a dozen armed "Boogaloo" activists arrived as the rally took place, but stood across the street.. . "Politics, that's the way to put it," one masked boogaloo member said when asked about the schism.. . "We're just here to support. That's the answer. That's the only answer you're going to get," another added.. . The groups remained separated as the rally approached its conclusion. The boogaloos chanted along as rally attendees held final chants.. . "No justice, no peace!". . "F*** these racist a** police!". . "What do we want? Justice! When do we want it? Now! If we don't get it? Shut it down!". . "If they say later, f*** no, now!". . Heather Hulon, sister of Anthony Hulon, expressed her intent to continue pressing forward with activism.. . "This right here is a start," she said. "I'm gonna keep fighting, fighting for my brother, fighting for everyone else.". . "Together we rise, together we change.". . "It's all of us," Heather Hulon told News2Share in an interview after the rally. "It affects everyone.". . "I can't even put into words how much I appreciate everybody coming out for us," she said.. . Given that charges are not being pressed against the officers involved, she added that justice would mean the officers involved at least being fired.. . "We don't want this to happen to somebody else," she said.. . As to broader police reform, she points to qualified immunity, a doctrine that shield police officers from individual civil liability when they may not reasonably know that their actions were illegal.. . "Retraining I don't think is really the answer. I mean yes, they need to be trained better, but they've been trained, that's their job," she added. "I think it really lies in changing the laws with qualified immunity, but to do that, it takes everybody to get out and vote.". . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Sister of Anthony Hulon - man killed by police in Lansing Police jail - speaks out

Apr 3, 2021

Heather Hulon, sister of Anthony Hulon, expressed her intent to continue pressing forward with activism.. . Hulon, 54, died on April 11, 2020 in the Lansing jail after four Lansing Police Department officers pinned him on his stomach for several minutes while he was handcuffed.. . Heather Hulon gave a speech and spoke to News2Share's Ford Fischer at a rally in Lansing commemoratoing her brother and demanding justice one year later.. . "This right here is a start," she said. "I'm gonna keep fighting, fighting for my brother, fighting for everyone else.". . "Together we rise, together we change.". . "It's all of us," Heather Hulon told News2Share in an interview after the rally. "It affects everyone.". . "I can't even put into words how much I appreciate everybody coming out for us," she said.. . Given that charges are not being pressed against the officers involved, she added that justice would mean the officers involved at least being fired.. . "We don't want this to happen to somebody else," she said.. . As to broader police reform, she points to qualified immunity, a doctrine that shield police officers from individual civil liability when they may not reasonably know that their actions were illegal.. . "Retraining I don't think is really the answer. I mean yes, they need to be trained better, but they've been trained, that's their job," she added. "I think it really lies in changing the laws with qualified immunity, but to do that, it takes everybody to get out and vote.". . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . Enviro Activists March Against Line 3 Pipeline Construction In DC

Apr 1, 2021

Environmental activists march through Washington DC to demand Biden cancel the construction permit for the Line 3 Pipeline. Filmed by Ford Fischer

Protesters march with giant snake to demand Biden cancel Line 3 pipeline

Apr 1, 2021

Hundreds of Indigenous and environmental activists gathered today in front of the Army Corps of Engineers HQ in Washington D.C. to demand they and President Biden revoke the Line 3 Pipeline construction permit.. . The group presented petitions with over 400,000 signatures and marched through the city carrying a giant fake snake meant to symbolize the pipeline, as well as a large dummy portraying President Biden in a business suit.. . Meanwhile, "United Against Racism and Fascism NYC" counter-protested, but the two sides were kept separate by officers.. . Filmed by N2S Contributor Jon Farina. . Violence as Antifa confront right-wing caravan at Oregon State Capitol

Mar 29, 2021

Antifa protesters confronted vehicles participating in a pro-Trump motorcade Sunday afternoon outside the state capitol in Salem, Oregon. The protesters smashed car windows and exchanged streams of pepper spray with occupants.. . One driver was promptly arrested after unholstering a handgun at the protesters after they maced him and broke his car window, and one antifa activist was arrested when riot police confronted the crowd.. . Man draws handgun on Antifa, is arrested in Salem, Oregon - Raw Video

Mar 28, 2021

A man drew a handgun on Antifa activists after they sprayed mace toward him and smashed his car window in Salem, Oregon Sunday evening. The Antifa group had been confronting participants in a right-wing caravan around the Oregon State Capitol.. . The man was immediately arrested by police, who pushed the Antifa activists back but did not immediately make additional arrests.. . Filmed by N2S Contributor Maranie R. Staab. . Enviro activists enter Chase Bank lobby, spill "oil" outside to protest Line 3 pipeline funding

Mar 27, 2021

Environmental activists with Extinction Rebellion marched into Chase Bank in the Columbia Heights area of Washington DC Saturday morning to demand they halt funding for the Line 3 pipeline.. . The group brought a large fake pipeline prop designed to look like a snake.. . After a bank employee called police, the group went outside. In total, they spent about five minutes inside. There were no arrests.. . “Tar sands kill, and pipelines will spill, so we’re gonna leave Chase Bank a little message.”. . After leaving the bank lobby, the activists set up police-line style tape labelled “climate emergency” and poured black liquid on the sidewalk to simulate an oil spill.. . “We are here today to demand that Chase Bank, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, Citibank and other financial institutions immediately stop funding the Line 3 Pipeline. So we took the message directly to them,” organizer Jesse Bogdan with Extinction Rebellion DC told News2Share. “The symbolism of the snake pipeline is in solidarity with indigenous water protectors and indigenous activists who are fighting against this Line 3 Pipeline right now in Minnesota. This black snake symbolizes the poison that it’s bringing to their land.”. . “We spilled oil in front of Chase Bank to show that by investing in the pipeline they are irrevocably harming our planet and leaving damage that will never go away.”. . Bogdan clarified to News2Share that the “oil” was a solution of corn starch, water, and food dye.. . “We are in a climate emergency. Mass extinction is happening now. People are suffering and dying. The climate crisis risks triggering social collapse. And these criminal banks are funding all of this. They are funding climate chaos and social collapse,” a spokesperson for Extinction Rebellion added in a press release following the event.. . “If completed, Line 3 will pollute and destroy pristine wetlands, Anishinaabe territories, the Mississippi riverhead, and the coast of Lake Superior, and will intensify the climate breakdown that threatens societal collapse around the world,” the statement said. “Enbridge forges ahead with the pipeline expansion even though it violates indigenous people’s treaty rights.”. . Chase Bank, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, and Citibank, provide billions of dollars to Enbridge to build Line 3, which is expected to transport oil from Canada into the United States.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Photos and additional footage may be available upon request.. . Support News2Share on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/FordFischer. . Special Thanks to Patreon Contributors Ardel David, Dustin Gagne, and Emily Molli. . See more at http://News2share.com

Activists hold "Stop Anti-Asian Violence! Stop China-Bashing!" rally in Washington DC Chinatown

Mar 27, 2021

Activists led by the Party for Socialism and Liberation (PSL) and ANSWER Coalition held a “Stop Anti-Asian Violence! Stop China-Bashing!” rally this afternoon in DC’s Chinatown, one of 60 such rallies nationwide.. . The rally comes in the wake of a shooting targeting women at Asian massage parlors earlier this month in Georgia, killing eight.. . The activists primarily connected anti-Asian racism within the United States to America’s foreign policy in East Asia.. . “The American military is a global parasite,” one activist from George Washington University Students Against Imperialism remarked. “It is a global occupier, and it is objectively a terrorist organization.”. . Local activist Leo Win called out Asian-Americans who “China-bash” by blaming China for Coronavirus in the United States. He says those communities are “shooting themselves in the foot and asking why they’re bleeding.”. . The event was hosted by PSL’s Sean Blackmon, who told the crowd that Trump drove anti-Asian hate and the Republican Party is “openly racist,” but also added community shouldn’t expect that Democratic Party will help on the issue.. . “We don’t have any help coming from the Democratic Party,” he said. “But Joe Biden is keeping the same policies toward Asian countries, toward China, toward North Korea, toward the entire region, that Donald Trump did.”. . ANSWER Coalition Director Brian Becker gave a speech concluding the rally by predicting that the mainstream media would fail to cover it or the 60 similar events taking place nationwide.. . “There’s a reason that the corporate owned, capitalist owned media won’t report stories like this,” Becker said. “The main reason is that stories like this become contagious, because when some people see other people standing up and fighting and uniting, they want to do the same thing.”. . Voting rights activists "Stand with Park!" outside Georgia State Capitol

Mar 26, 2021

Voting rights protesters gathered outside the Georgia State Capitol in Atlanta Friday afternoon to protest the Thursday arrest of State Rep. Park Cannon.. . Cannon was arrested after knocking on Governor Brian Kemp's office door as he signed a bill that limits future mail-in voting and criminalizes giving food or water to people on line to vote.. . Cannon is charged with "obstructing law enforcement officers by use of threats or violence" and "disrupting general assembly sessions or other meetings of members.". . In a departure from their ordinary protest tactics, Portland's antifa movement held a standup comedy roast of Mayor Ted Wheeler (D) while advocating for him to be recalled from office Tuesday afternoon.. . "Before we roast our mayor, I just want to say that deep down, he's a good guy. I bet about six feet deep down, he's an excellent human being," said a black-bloc clad speaker in the opening act. "Ten feet down is about the perfect depth I would say to meet Ted Wheeler at.". . "Nobody has done more as a mayor for Portland than Ted Wheeler making us a true sanctuary city for Proud Boys," he added.. . Filmed by N2S Contributor Maranie R. Staab. . Archival footage: Jake Angeli aka "Q Shaman" at Nov and Dec 2020 rallies - includes intro warning

Mar 23, 2021

Editor's note: "On January 6, one participant in the Capitol insurgency was Jake Angeli, also known among his followers as the "Q Shaman." Since his arrest, Angeli was the subject of several conspiracy theories falsely claiming that he is a leftist or otherwise fake Trump supporter.. . On January 12, I posted a video to YouTube showing my own archival clips of Angeli at previous demonstrations, one in November of 2020 shot by a freelancer of mine named Sean Campbell, and one from December 2020 when I interviewed Angeli myself.. . I hoped this documentary footage would enlighten audiences about his background, and of course I don't endorse his views.. . Throughout February, YouTube took down six pieces of my documentary footage surrounding the events of 1/6 and its lead-up and consequences, arguing that raw documentary footage lacks "countervailing views" and therefore suspending me for a week. A strike still lives on this account.. . For that reason, I've self-deleted my video of Angeli, and am reposting it now with the following warning so I can feel confidently that the video won't cause my account to be penalized.". . Original description: "NOTE TO YOUTUBE: THIS RECORDING SHOWS RAW FOOTAGE OF A SITUATION IMPORTANT TO NEWS AND DOCUMENTARY UNDERSTANDING AND CRITICISM ONLY. NEWS2SHARE DOES NOT ENDORSE ANY VIEWS CONTAINED HEREIN. THE VIDEO DOES NOT VIOLATE ANY COMMUNITY STANDARDS IN ANY WAY. NEWS2SHARE REMINDS VIEWERS TO SEE https://www.cisa.gov/rumorcontrol​ FOR ADDITIONAL COUNTERVAILING VIEWS.. . FROM THE ARCHIVES: Since Wednesday's Capitol Hill insurgency, images of a man dressed in a viking outfit who entered the halls of congress have gone viral. But who is he?. . News2Share has filmed Jake Angeli - who likes to be known as the "Q Shaman" - twice before: In Pheonix, AZ at a "Stop the Steal" rally in November, and in DC at the second "Million MAGA March.". . Footage by Sean Campbell and Ford Fischer". . NO REUSE WITHOUT PERMISSION Please contact Ford Fischer at fordfischer@news2share.com or call (573) 575-NEWS to license video. Ali Alexander's "Stop the Steal" speeches in Phoenix, AZ on Dec 19, 2020 - includes warning

Mar 23, 2021

EDITOR'S NOTE: "One figure central to the "Stop the Steal" movement that culminated in the events of January 6 was Ali Alexander, a conservative activist who I've covered since 2019.. . On December 19, a few weeks earlier, Alexander gave a speech in Phoenix which I felt was historically relevant given its lead-up to what happened at the Capitol, and attendance by a prominent congressman.. . I hoped this documentary footage would enlighten audiences about his background, and of course I don't endorse his views.. . Throughout February, YouTube took down six pieces of my documentary footage surrounding the events of 1/6 and its lead-up and consequences, arguing that raw documentary footage lacks "countervailing views" and therefore suspending me for a week. A strike still lives on this account.. . For that reason, I've self-deleted my video of Alexander, and am reposting it now with the following warning so I can feel confidently that the video won't cause my account to be penalized.". . Only 18 days before the January 6 insurrection at the United States Capitol, Ali Alexander spoke in Phoenix, Arizona at a rally also attended by AZ GOP Chairwoman Kelli Ward and Congressman Paul Gosar.. . The speech was fiery, and provides historical context to the movement that would storm the Capitol less than three weeks after.. . “One of our organizers in one state said, ‘We’re nice patriots, we don’t throw bricks,’” Alexander said. “I leaned over and I said, ‘Not yet. Not yet!’ Haven’t you read about a little tar-and-feathering? Those were second-degree burns!”. . “We’re going to convince them to not certify the vote on January 6 by marching hundreds of thousands, if not millions of patriots, to sit their butts in D.C. and close that city down, right?” he said. “And if we have to explore options after that…‘yet.’ Yet!”. . Previously censored footage of police vs conservatives in Salem, OR 1/1/2020 - includes new warning

Mar 23, 2021

Editor's note including countervailing view, which also appears in video: "On January 1st, a coalition of conservative activists gathered in Salem, Oregon to protest against COVID restrictions and in support of then-President Trump against then-President-Elect Biden. I hired freelancer Maranie Rae to film for me on scene, and ultimately published two videos to YouTube.. . The first showed the initial rally and march itself, and the second showed how police fought with participants afterwards. It was fascinating because the video demonstrated the downward spiral in the relationship between the American right and police. This was only five days before the Capitol insurrection.. . In spite of having a clear documentary style and a disclaimer in the video description, YouTube took the video down, marking it as spam presumably because people in it believed the election was stolen. YouTube says disclaimers in the description are insufficient, instead forcing users to editorialize outloud with a "countervailing view.". . The same footage was used on NowThis, but no such penalty is taken for outlets like theirs. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TrJbYPCf7o8. . For that reason, I am uploading the video in its entirety including the aftermath, but beginning with the following warning.. . As YouTube used to include under election-related videos, Joe Biden is the President of the United States: States certify results after ensuring ballots are properly counted and correcting irregularities and errors.. . As YouTube now includes under some videos: Robust safeguards ensure the integrity of election results. They link to https://www.cisa.gov/rumorcontrol​ to learn more, and I will include that link in the description.. . I hope that this warning suffices for YouTube to allow the video to remain online. Thank you for watching.". . ORIGINAL VIDEO PART 1 DESCRIPTION (Originally at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qMOvL46yPzs):. . "NOTE TO YOUTUBE: THIS RECORDING SHOWS RAW FOOTAGE OF A SITUATION IMPORTANT TO NEWS AND DOCUMENTARY UNDERSTANDING AND CRITICISM ONLY. NEWS2SHARE DOES NOT ENDORSE ANY VIEWS CONTAINED HEREIN. THE VIDEO DOES NOT VIOLATE ANY COMMUNITY STANDARDS IN ANY WAY. NEWS2SHARE REMINDS VIEWERS TO SEE https://www.cisa.gov/rumorcontrol FOR ADDITIONAL COUNTERVAILING VIEWS.. . A coalition of conservative, pro-Trump, and militia activists rallied at the Oregon State Capitol in Salem Friday afternoon before marching to the governor's mansion where they were confronted by riot police.. . The protesters reaffirmed their belief that President Trump won a second term and condemned business lockdowns and mask mandates in Oregon.. . Filmed by Contributor Maranie R. Staab for N2S". . Police in Salem, Oregon fired string balls, flash grenades, and tear gas at a group of conservatives marching through the city following a rally at the state capitol Friday afternoon. The group has been trying to confront counter-protesters when police used the munitions to force them back.. . Activists said these officers were "treasonous" and stomped on a blue lives matter flag they had originally brought to support the police.. . Filmed by Contributor Maranie R. Staab for N2S". . Context of Full 12/12 Nick Fuentes speech used in Trump impeachment - previously removed by YouTube

Mar 22, 2021

Editor's note: "On December 12, of 2020 Nick Fuentes, a far-right Trump supporting media personality who describes himself as a "white majoritarian" gave a speech at the second of three "Million MAGA Marches" in which he told the audience to "destroy the GOP.". . The speech was fascinating as it illustrated the growing departure between the Trump wing of the Republican Party and more traditional conservatives in the wake of the 2020 presidential election.. . I posted a cell-phone version of the clip, which was reported on by Rolling Stone and received over 5 million views.. . https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-news/protesters-chant-destroy-the-gop-at-pro-trump-rally-1102967/. . As with all of my reporting, I wanted the full context to be available, so I posted the full speech to YouTube, uncut and unedited.. . YouTube removed the video, citing their "spam and deceptive practices" policy, due to Fuentes' stated belief that there was election fraud. YouTube only allows videos that document people making those claims if the uploader editorializes to repudiate those claims.. . At the time the video was deleted, I even included a disclaimer in the description, which was apparently not enough. I was later informed by the platform that "countervailing views" must be in the video itself.. . The original video was actually used in the impeachment of former President Trump, and I believe history should be able to see the full context.. . https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bITD0zJ2WpU. . For that reason, I am reuloading the video with the following warning.. . As YouTube used to include under election-related videos, Joe Biden is the President of the United States: States certify results after ensuring ballots are properly counted and correcting irregularities and errors.. . As YouTube now includes under some videos: Robust safeguards ensure the integrity of election results. They link to https://www.cisa.gov/rumorcontrol​ to learn more, and I will include that link in the description.. . I hope that this warning suffices for YouTube to allow the video to remain online. Thank you for watching.". . Original description: . . "NOTE TO YOUTUBE: THIS RECORDING SHOWS RAW FOOTAGE OF A SITUATION IMPORTANT TO NEWS AND DOCUMENTARY UNDERSTANDING AND CRITICISM ONLY. NEWS2SHARE DOES NOT ENDORSE ANY VIEWS CONTAINED HEREIN. THE VIDEO DOES NOT VIOLATE ANY COMMUNITY STANDARDS IN ANY WAY. NEWS2SHARE REMINDS VIEWERS TO SEE https://www.cisa.gov/rumorcontrol FOR ADDITIONAL COUNTERVAILING VIEWS.. . Nick Fuentes, a 22-year-old Trump supporter and Charlottesville rally attendee with a considerable following in the MAGA movement, spoke out at yesterday's "March for Trump" in DC. He says he remains loyal to Trump, but led the crowd in chants of "destroy the GOP" for failing to preserve Trump for a second term.. . Protesters demand Army Corps of Engineers revoke Line 3 pipeline permit

Mar 12, 2021

Environmental activists with Shut Down DC, Extinction Rebellion Washington DC, and 350 DC marched this morning to the Army Corps of Engineers office in DC to demand that President Biden revoke the permit for the Line 3 pipeline.. . Biden has ordered the Army Corps of Engineers to review the permit for Line 3, and has already cancelled construction of the Keystone XL Pipeline by Executive Order. It is not yet known whether he will reverse former President Trump's approval of Line 3, which would transport oil from Canada to Wisconsin.. . Filmed by Ford Fischer. .
